languages.text: "Если бы каждый был наделен даром зрить мир как я, подобное бы никогда не случилось. Но глаза обычных людей слепы к оттенкам, что скрываются в чужих душах".
"If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."
languages.original_text: "Если бы каждый был наделен даром зрить мир как я, подобное бы никогда не случилось. Но глаза обычных людей слепы к оттенкам, что скрываются в чужих душах".

traits.locale_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “如果每个人生来都拥有力量，可以像我一样看透这个世界的本质，这样的事情就永远不会发生。然而，普通人的眼睛无法看见潜伏在他人灵魂中的色彩。”
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: “如果每个人生来都拥有力量，可以像我一样看透这个世界的本质，这样的事情就永远不会发生。然而，普通人的眼睛无法看见潜伏在他人灵魂中的色彩。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Si tout le monde pouvait voir le monde tel que je le vois, alors ce ne serait jamais arrivé. Hélas ! Les yeux des gens ordinaires sont aveugles aux nuances tapies dans l'âme de leur voisin. »
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: « Si tout le monde pouvait voir le monde tel que je le vois, alors ce ne serait jamais arrivé. Hélas ! Les yeux des gens ordinaires sont aveugles aux nuances tapies dans l'âme de leur voisin. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wäre jeder mit der Gabe gesegnet, die Welt wie ich zu sehen, würde so etwas niemals geschehen. Doch die Augen gewöhnlicher Menschen sehen die Farben nicht, die in anderer Leute Seelen lauern."
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre jeder mit der Gabe gesegnet, die Welt wie ich zu sehen, würde so etwas niemals geschehen. Doch die Augen gewöhnlicher Menschen sehen die Farben nicht, die in anderer Leute Seelen lauern."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「誰もが私のように世界を見る才に恵まれていたら、こんなことは二度と起こらないでしょう。ですが、普通の人々が持つ目は、そうでない人間の魂に潜む色を見ることは叶いません」
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: 「誰もが私のように世界を見る才に恵まれていたら、こんなことは二度と起こらないでしょう。ですが、普通の人々が持つ目は、そうでない人間の魂に潜む色を見ることは叶いません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Si todo el mundo pudiera ver el mundo como yo, esto sería impensable. Pero los ojos de la gente corriente están ciegos ante los tonos que acechan en las almas de los demás».
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: «Si todo el mundo pudiera ver el mundo como yo, esto sería impensable. Pero los ojos de la gente corriente están ciegos ante los tonos que acechan en las almas de los demás».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

languages.text: "Herkes dünyayı benim gibi görebilme nimetine sahip olsa böyle bir durum asla yaşanmazdı. Lakin sıradan insanlar, diğerlerinin ruhlarındaki farklı derinlikleri görebilme kabiliyetinden mahrumdur."
languages.original_text: "If everyone were endowed with the gift of seeing the world as I do, such a thing would never happen. But the eyes of ordinary people are blind to the hues that lurk in other people's souls."

traits.locale_text: "Herkes dünyayı benim gibi görebilme nimetine sahip olsa böyle bir durum asla yaşanmazdı. Lakin sıradan insanlar, diğerlerinin ruhlarındaki farklı derinlikleri görebilme kabiliyetinden mahrumdur."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
